posts.title: Angular, React, and Vue in 2023 - all in one app using Webpack 5 Module Federation
posts.summary: The subject of this article is to go through the technical implementation  of React and Vue remote modules injection into the Angular shell app with the help of Webpack 5 ModuleFederationPlugin...
